text: Achern () is a city in Western Baden-Württemberg, Germany. It is about southwest of Baden-Baden and northeast of Offenburg. Achern is the fourth largest city in the county of Ortenau (Ortenaukreis), after Offenburg, Lahr / Black Forest and Kehl. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Cities in Baden-Württemberg Category:Ortenaukreis
title: Achern
